statements: SELECT * FROM OEE_Calculation
SELECT machine_id, availability, performance FROM OEE_Calculation
SELECT id, quality, oee FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE machine_id = 1
SELECT * FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE quality > 0.8
SELECT machine_id, performance, oee FROM OEE_Calculation ORDER BY machine_id DESC
SELECT id, machine_id, availability, performance, quality, oee FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE machine_id = 1 ORDER BY oee DESC
SELECT * FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE availability > 0.9 AND quality < 0.8
SELECT machine_id, performance, quality FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE oee > 0.85 ORDER BY machine_id
SELECT id, availability, performance, quality, oee FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE machine_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM OEE_Calculation WHERE quality > performance AND availability < 0.7
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT production_date, units_produced, downtime_reason FROM Production WHERE units_produced > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corporation' AND installation_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, p.production_date, p.units_produced FROM Equipment e JOIN Production p ON e.equipment_id = p.equipment_id WHERE p.idle_time < 10 ORDER BY p.production_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Production WHERE units_produced > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT production_id, production_date, units_produced FROM Production WHERE downtime_reason IS NOT NULL AND idle_time > 0 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM OEE_Records WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, installation_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, production_date FROM Production_Log ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM Production_Log WHERE equipment_id = 2;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM Production_Log GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM OEE_Records WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC, downtime_minutes ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01' AND maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;

SELECT equipment_id, SUM(production_quantity) AS total_production FROM Production_Log WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30' GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_production > 1000 ORDER BY total_production DESC;
SELECT r.start_time, r.end_time, e.equipment_name FROM OEE_Records r INNER JOIN Equipment e ON r.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE r.downtime_minutes > 30 AND e.manufacturer = 'ABC Corporation';

SELECT e.equipment_name, p.performance_rating FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN Production_Log p ON e.equipment_id = p.equipment_id WHERE p.performance_rating < 0.8 OR p.performance_rating IS NULL ORDER BY e.equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, production_rate FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, setup_time, production_rate FROM equipment WHERE setup_time > 10;
SELECT production_date, quantity_produced FROM production WHERE quantity_produced > 100;
SELECT equipment_id, downtime_reason FROM downtime ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer'
SELECT equipment_name, setup_time FROM equipment WHERE production_rate > 100
SELECT equipment_name, production_date FROM production ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(downtime_percentage) AS avg_downtime_percentage, MAX(production_rate) AS max_production_rate FROM efficiency
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(quantity_produced) AS total_quantity_produced FROM production GROUP BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, production_rate FROM Equipment WHERE production_rate < 10 ORDER BY equipment_id;
SELECT SUM(quantity_produced) AS total_production FROM Production;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE production_rate > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT production_id, start_time, end_time, quantity_produced FROM Production ORDER BY quantity_produced DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, downtime_start, downtime_end, reason FROM Downtime WHERE reason LIKE '%mechanical%';
SELECT * FROM Efficiency WHERE efficiency > 0.9;
